Banner.Description: I have 6 years of experience developing systems, products, technological solutions to make the web a better place. I build fast, secure, and scalable APIs using ASP.NET Core, PostgreSQL, and Azure/AWS—designed to power modern web, mobile, and SaaS platforms.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In over 6 years of experience in software development, I’ve taken on various roles including Backend Developer, API Engineer, and Cloud Solutions Architect. I enjoy applying my technical knowledge to build solutions that are not only functional but scalable and impactful.

My strengths include designing clean, modular backend systems, optimizing application performance, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and integrating cloud services to enhance reliability and scalability. I’m always looking for ways to improve architecture, streamline deployment, and add meaningful value to the projects I’m involved in.
Outside of client work, I love creating personal tools, experimenting with new technologies, and sharing insights through my technical blog.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description: Helping an insurance company in USA to scale and build a microservice based solution
Mitigated code and security flaws by using Veracode
Developing features and fixing bugs using MSSQL and .NET

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description: Helped a healthcare company in USA to design and build their dynamic dashboard
Developed new features and improved architecture with microservices
Bug fixing for thier existing solution that uses ASP.NET and MSSQL
Helped an USA based NGO to build a survey application with ASP.NET and PostgreSQL

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Engineer IV
Description: Built and maintained scalable backend services for multiple SaaS and e-commerce platforms
Led backend team for weavio.tech, managing billions of records per month
Integrated Zoom OAuth and Razorpay on stepout.pro
Migrated databases to AWS DynamoDB for transcomdigital.com
Developed RESTful APIs using .NET 6, Node.js, and Docker
Deployed services on AWS (EKS, EC2, SQS, Lambda) and Azure

Experience.Jobs.Title: Associate Software Engineer
Description: Built microservices and admin consoles for IQVIA's notification platform
Developed modules for a workforce management tool used by DeWolff, Boberg & Associates
Performed bug fixing, performance optimization, and system enhancements
Worked with ASP.NET Core, Angular, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: WEAVIO
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: WEAVIO is an AI-powered RMG management solution developed in-house, where I served as Backend Team Lead. I designed a microservices architecture to manage large-scale production and HR data, optimized PostgreSQL queries to handle billions of records monthly, and implemented background processing with Hangfire alongside AWS SQS for high availability. The project showcased my skills in microservices design, database optimization, and scalable system architecture.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Apex4U
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Apex4U is an e-commerce platform developed for Apex Retail Chain, where I worked as a Backend Engineer. I integrated Algolia for real-time search, designed high-performance APIs to serve millions of users, and enabled omnichannel communication between physical and digital storefronts. The system was deployed using Docker and Kubernetes on AWS EKS, highlighting my expertise in API development, cloud infrastructure, and performance optimization.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Orchestrated Analytics
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: At IQVIA, a global leader in health information technology and clinical research, I contributed to the development of a notification microservice as part of a larger distributed system. I was responsible for building one of the core backend services and integrating it with other microservices, as well as developing an admin console for managing service configurations. This role allowed me to work on enterprise-grade solutions within a microservices architecture, demonstrating my skills in backend development, API integration, and system communication within a high-compliance, data-sensitive environment.

OtherProjects.Title: Services & Products

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: REST API Development
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: I develop secure, scalable REST APIs using ASP.NET Core with clean architecture, JWT/OAuth authentication, and robust logging/error handling. Includes database integration, Swagger documentation, and deployment support for Azure or AWS.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Let's talk, set up a call with me.
